results.content: It's sounds like an actor  is just reading out the manual
results.content_html: It's sounds like an actor is just reading out the manual

results.content: This course starts out in a cohesive fashion, but this quickly changes beyond the first section. The other two sections comprise more technical details, but have wildly different assumptions about the user and their computer's setup. It gives the feeling of the course being thrown together from videos that were lying around at Packt. There clearly wasn't much thought put into the course's construction as a whole. The content in terms of syllabus is good, but the pedagogy is lacking particularly in the later two sections.
